long_description: The Kinetic Turntable riser ring is an absolute necessity for the Kinetic Rock-N-Roll bike trainer. It's designed to hold the bike level while training. Sits under front tire for a stable ride, no matter how long or hard the workout; the swivel base allows the front wheel to move freely to help perfect technique. Adjustable to 4 heights to simulate flat roads on almost any bike.
